name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4 - Collector's Edition
name_original: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4 - Collector's Edition
description:
Avi Games presents the newest game in the Big Adventure series with Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4!

Packed with challenging hidden-object scenes and clever mini-games, this European holiday offers a vacation experience like no other! You'll visit 30 incredible locations across 15 different countries, take in the beauty of national parks, have a look around inspiring museums, trek through ancient castles, and so much more! Pack your bags and ready your skills for adventure in this all-new hidden-object experience!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
Eight additional locations to explore!
Keep the beautiful soundtrack at your side with the handy music player!
Sharpen your skills with 12 bonus mini-games!
Exclusive wallpapers to download and enjoy!
Collect and display souvenirs to remember your trip!
